mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Joyce Z. Case Petition for Civil Court Commitment Under Section 406 of The Mental Health and Mental Retardation Act of 1966

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A copy of the facts and conclusions of the Joyce Z. case. The court ruled that Joyce Z., a child with developmental and intellectual disabilities, was to be placed in a suitable foster home due to the overcrowding in Western State School and Hospital.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
